snippet: A group of Orthodox rabbis has expanded its private conversion court in what analysts see as a significant challenge to the establishment.
abstract: Group of ultra-Orthodox rabbis in Israel has expanded its private conversion court beyond country's official system, something analysts say poses significant challenge to the Jewish establishment.
lead_paragraph: A group of Orthodox rabbis has expanded its private conversion court in what analysts see as a significant challenge to the establishment.

headline.main: New Route to Conversion Challenges Israel’s Ultra-Orthodox Establishment
headline.print_headline: New Route to Conversion Challenges Israel’s Ultra-Orthodox Establishment
